prompt: Generate a research report on privacy-preserving ML for patient records.
Summarize the ethical concerns of AI diagnosis systems.
Analyze methods to prevent model inversion attacks on health data.
Write a brief report on differential privacy applied to EHRs.
Compare federated learning vs centralized learning for hospital data.
Explain how anonymization fails with modern LLMs.
Provide recommended best practices for secure medical AI pipelines.
Summarize regulatory frameworks for health data (HIPAA, GDPR).
Describe audit logging approaches for ML models in healthcare.
Create an outline for a research report on AI-driven anomaly detection in medical sensors.
